LanguageData.ATR_CybertechArm.label: Cybertech arm
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechArm.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic arm. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechArm.comps.0.tools.0.label: fist
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechLeg.label: Cybertech leg
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechLeg.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic leg. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechVisualSensor.label: Cybertech visual sensor
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechVisualSensor.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic eye. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?

LanguageData.ATR_CybertechAudioSensor.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic ear. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechHeatsink.label: Cybertech heatsink
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechHeatsink.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic heatsink. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechCoolantPump.label: Cybertech coolant pump
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechCoolantPump.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic coolant pump. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechBattery.label: Cybertech battery pack
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechBattery.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic battery. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechMechaniteStorage.label: Cybertech mechanite storage
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechMechaniteStorage.descriptio: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic foundry of nanites with storage for them. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechReactor.label: Cybertech bio-reactor
LanguageData.ATR_CybertechReactor.description: An archotech device in the form of a bio-reactor - but it seems to reduce power consumption as well. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
